CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 15, 1945, pg. 26 reads:"Wedding Anniversary - Mr. and Mrs. T.J. Abercrombie of 25 Breen Street, West View, Pa., celebrated twenty-five years of marital happiness recently. Guests present at the celebration were, seated: Mrs. Sidney Grayson, Mr. and Mrs. T.J .Abercrombie; aides, Mesdames Mildred Haywood, Arncita Brooks, Francis Duval, Maleida Young, the Rev. W.W. Boone, Mrs. Evelyn Crawford, Miss Grace Briscoe, Mrs. Mary Tolley and Mrs. Anna Briscoe.  Out-of-town guests were Mrs. Sidney Grayson of Montgomery, Ala.; Mr. and Mrs. A.E. Fay and son, of New Brunswick, N.J.; L.Q. Abercrombie of Boston, Mass., and Mr. and Mrs. Samuel Clay of New York. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mr. and Mrs. T. J. Abercrombie posed behind three tiered twenty-fifth wedding anniversary cake in home at 25 Breen Street
